member.name: T:SUnit.Discovery.Rules
member.summary: Contains methods that define the rules for what is a valid test, what is a valid fixture, and what is a valid factory.

member.name: M:SUnit.Discovery.Rules.IsReturnTypeValidForTestMethod(System.Type)
member.summary: Indicates whether the specified type is valid as the return type for a test method.
member.returns: True if the specified type is a legal return type for a unit test method.

member.name: M:SUnit.Discovery.Rules.IsValidTestMethod(System.Reflection.MethodInfo)
member.summary: Indicates whether the specified is a valid test method.
member.returns: True if the specified is valid.

member.name: M:SUnit.Discovery.Rules.FindAllValidTestMethods(System.Type)
member.summary: Finds all the methods on the specified type that are valid test methods.
member.returns: All methods defined on the type that are valid test methods.

member.name: M:SUnit.Discovery.Rules.GetDefaultConstructor(System.Type)
member.summary: Gets the eligible default constructor for the specified type, if one exists.
member.returns: The eligible default constructor, if one exists. if none is found.

member.name: M:SUnit.Discovery.Rules.FindNamedConstructors(System.Type)
member.summary: Finds all the valid named constructors on the specified type.
member.returns: All the valid named constructor methods on the specified fixture type.

member.name: M:SUnit.Discovery.Rules.FindNamedConstructorsOnNonGenericType(System.Type)
member.summary: Finds all the valid named constructors on a non generic, or constructed generic, fixture type.
member.param: The type of the fixture. Must be either non-generic or a fully-constructed generic type. In other words, must be .
member.returns: All valid named constructor methods found on the fixture type.

member.name: M:SUnit.Discovery.Rules.FindNamedConstructorsOnGenericType(System.Type)
member.summary: Finds all the valid named constructors on an unconstructed generic fixture type. On an unconstructed generic fixture type, a valid named constructor returns a constructed version of the fixture, or a subclass of a constructed version of the fixture.
member.param: The type of the fixture. Must be a not-fully-constructed generic type. In other words, must be .
member.returns: All valid named constructor methods found on the fixture type.

member.name: F:SUnit.Discovery.Results.ResultKind.Error
member.summary: The test did not run due to an exception, and we don't know whether the code under test or the test itself is to blame.

member.name: F:SUnit.Discovery.Results.ResultKind.Fail

member.name: F:SUnit.Discovery.Results.ResultKind.Pass

member.name: P:SUnit.Discovery.Results.TestResult.Kind
member.summary: Whether the result was a pass, fail, or error.

member.name: M:SUnit.Discovery.TestRunner.RunTest(SUnit.Discovery.UnitTest)
member.summary: Runs the specified .
member.returns: An that produces the s from running the test. The obervable will complete once all test results are finished.
member.remarks: For single tests, the observable will yield a single result and then complete. If a test throws an exception, the returned will be an , but the observable will still complete normally ( will be called, rather than ).
